comment: I had him last semester, and he was by far my favorite teacher. He made the class very easy to follow, and we were able to use a notecard on every Unit Exam. I would say to be respectful and also come to class, although attendance is not mandatory.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Beware of pop quizzes

comment: Great professor. He doesn't teach as if we already have degrees in chemistry, and ensures that everyone understands the information. Follows the schedule in the syllabus so you should know what to expect.. but don't skip classes. Sometimes there's pop quizzes.

Honestly the best professor I had last semester. Super sweet, great lectures. 
Detailed PowerPoints, helpful review.
Lots of homework, but it's necessary for a chemistry class. 
He doesn't take attendance, but highly recommend going to class. 
Notecard for all the tests, final is standardized nationwide.
Great with accommodations!
Awesome Professor, He will help you out if your struggling. Chemistry can get hard but this professor makes it easier.

This professor is amazing. He really cares about help you in the lab and wants you to succeeded. He WILL help you make sure you understand everything that you need. His labs are fun and connect with the course well. I highly recommend him as your professor. He is my favorite professor I had this semester.

I literally cannot recommend him enough, In high school I really struggled with understanding chemistry and ultimately hated chem before his class. Im not even lying I think chem was my strongest subject all year. 10/10 professor if you HAVE to take 1211 definitely take him if you can.

Its not req to attend lecture but I recommend it. DO THE HOMEWORK PLS. over the semester its 35 learning recaps & 49 smartworks but theyre simple. DO THE EXTRA CREDIT!! I had a low B after the final but with extra credit I'm at a 93! he explains things really well, so well that I considered changing my major to chemistry. Rainey is simply that guy.
Great Professor would definitely take again he offered great extra credit throughout the year. Also offered plenty of review material.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Highly recommend! Amazing at explaining topics and literally the best science professor I've ever had.

Professor Rainey is one of the best science teachers I have ever taken. His lectures are super organized and he teaches with proficiency. I would 1000000% recommend taking him. He breaks down material so well and gives so much extra credit.

Professor Rainey is one of the best professors I've ever had. He is extremely caring, provides so much help to struggling students, and is an amazing teacher. While attendance isn't mandatory, I would recommend going to all of the lectures because they are so informative. Overall, I encourage everybody to take him.

Professor Rainey is a great teacher. He makes chemistry as easy to understand as humanly possible (which is a difficult task). His grading criteria is built to ensure you pass the class regardless of what you make on the ACS final so do WHATEVER extra credit he offers you no matter how long it takes. 10/10 Prof :)
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework

comment: Best science teacher I have ever had, hands down.

Dr. Rainey is fantastic as a great professor as he guides you through experiments and gives feedback on lab reports when graded. There is a final and you take it a week early and its not hard since there is a practice test online and it prepares you well. He teaches the material well and he clarifies things for lecture if you are confused.
